description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，一级大法官。曾任中国人民解放军军事法院院长、第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员等职务。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA) and a Grand Justice of the first rank. He formerly served as the President of the PLA Military Court and a member of the Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress.

en: Southwest College of Political Science and Law

description.zh-cn: 位于中国重庆市的一所政法类高等院校，现名为西南政法大学。
description.en: A higher education institution for political science and law located in Chongqing, China, now known as Southwest University of Political Science and Law.

en: Security Department of the General Political Department

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部下设的负责军队内部安全保卫工作的部门。
description.en: The department under the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army responsible for internal security within the military.

en: Discipline Inspection Commission of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The discipline inspection body of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事法院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事法院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Liberation Army.

en: Grand Justice of the first rank

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国法官的最高等级。
description.en: The highest rank for judges in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事检察院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事检察院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高检察机关。
description.en: The highest procuratorial organ of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任中国人民解放军军事检察院检察长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who formerly served as the Procurator-General of the PLA Military Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的副大军区职、正军职、副军职军官的主要军衔。
description.en: A primary military rank for officers at the deputy theater command level, corps leader level, and deputy corps leader level in the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 13th National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会宪法和法律委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会宪法和法律委员会
en: Constitution and Law Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任全国人大常委会副秘书长、全国人大宪法和法律委员会主任委员等职务。
description.en: A Chinese politician who has served as Deputy Secretary-General of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and Chairman of the Constitution and Law Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国人民解放军军事法院院长。
description.en: A major general of the People's Liberation Army, who formerly served as the President of the PLA Military Court.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任中国人民解放军军事法院院长。
description.en: A major general of the People's Liberation Army, who formerly served as the President of the PLA Military Court.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 刘季幸是江苏靖江人。
description.en: Liu Jixing is a native of Jingjiang, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 1979年至1983年，刘季幸就读于西南政法学院。
description.en: From 1979 to 1983, Liu Jixing studied at the Southwest College of Political Science and Law.

position.zh-cn: 侦察局局长、保卫局局长
position.en: Director of the Reconnaissance Bureau, Director of the Security Bureau

description.zh-cn: 刘季幸曾任总政治部保卫部侦察局局长、保卫局局长。
description.en: Liu Jixing previously served as the Director of the Reconnaissance Bureau and the Director of the Security Bureau of the Security Department of the General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 刘季幸曾任中央军委纪委专职委员。
description.en: Liu Jixing previously served as a full-time member of the Discipline Inspection Commission of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事法院

description.zh-cn: 刘季幸于2009年7月任中国人民解放军军事法院副院长，2011年8月升任院长，直至2018年6月卸任。
description.en: Liu Jixing was appointed Vice President of the PLA Military Court in July 2009, promoted to President in August 2011, and served until June 2018.

position.en: Grand Justice of the first rank

description.zh-cn: 2012年12月，刘季幸获晋一级大法官。
description.en: In December 2012, Liu Jixing was promoted to the rank of Grand Justice of the first rank.

description.zh-cn: 2014年12月，刘季幸与时任中国人民解放军军事检察院检察长李晓峰一同晋升为副大军区级。
description.en: In December 2014, Liu Jixing and Li Xiaofeng, then Procurator-General of the PLA Military Procuratorate, were promoted together to the deputy theater command level.

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，刘季幸当选为第十三届全国人大代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Liu Jixing was elected as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 2016年8月，刘季幸晋升中将军衔。
description.en: In August 2016, Liu Jixing was promoted to the rank of lieutenant general.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，刘季幸开始担任第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员。
description.en: In March 2018, Liu Jixing began to serve as a member of the Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会宪法和法律委员会

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月，刘季幸开始担任第十三届全国人民代表大会宪法和法律委员会副主任委员。
description.en: In March 2018, Liu Jixing began to serve as a Vice Chairman of the Constitution and Law Committee of the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 刘季幸担任全国人大宪法和法律委员会副主任委员时，李飞是该委员会的主任委员。
description.en: When Liu Jixing served as Vice Chairman of the Constitution and Law Committee of the National People's Congress, Li Fei was the Chairman of that committee.

description.zh-cn: 刘季幸接替苏勇担任中国人民解放军军事法院院长职务。
description.en: Liu Jixing succeeded Su Yong as the President of the PLA Military Court.

description.zh-cn: 刘立根接替刘季幸担任中国人民解放军军事法院院长职务。
description.en: Liu Ligen succeeded Liu Jixing as the President of the PLA Military Court.

description.zh-cn: 刘季幸是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Liu Jixing is a member of the Communist Party of China.
